[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5972259][color=#FFFFFF]$100 ScratchCard w/guaranteed WINS![/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Omniscient has released a brand-new scratch card that is a whopping $100 and has a 100% chance of winning some bytes, Will you get lucky?

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5972078][color=#FFFFFF]Member Pruning[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1][color=#9999FF][b]Omniscient[/b][/color][/url]
Once again Omniscient has pruned a load of accounts, this time all the members in the closed group that haven't been on the site for three years were deleted.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5971528][color=#FFFFFF]Hack Game Information Thread[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3739930][color=#FFFFFF][b]BTC[/b][/color][/url]
The member BTC has made a very in-depth thread all about the new Hack Forums game, it goes over everything from the brand-new missions to the battery.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5972993][color=#FFFFFF]Politics Token Black, Token Mexican and Token Gays in the media.[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=1573817][color=#00cc66][b]Spaark[/b][/color][/url]
Degrading the idea of multiculturalism has recently hit the media, and Spaark has had his say, There are some very strong points within the thread. Have your say!
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5972851][color=#FFFFFF]Lobster VS Steak[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][color=#ED1C24][b]Pikachu[/b][/color][/url]
What do you love more, Steak or lobster? Well, let Pikachu know in his poll.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5973214][color=#FFFFFF]If you could tell yourself from five years ago something, what would it be?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=787112][color=#EC7E03][b]Tonight[/b][/color][/url]
Say you go back in time, and you see yourself. What would you tell yourself? It could be anything even a joke that you wish you had at that point in time.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5973378][color=#FFFFFF]Anyone else have a car with no air condition?[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=3846003][color=#0066FF][b]packofmidgets[/b][/color][/url]
Do you have aircon in your car? If not then this thread can help you out.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=5959931][color=#FFFFFF][Official] Wolfpack Contest: Short Story[/color][/url] - [url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=484743][color=#0066FF][b]Zeus[/b][/color][/url]
The group Wolfpack are running a short story contest where you can write a story about whatever you like, and you could win yourself a very large number of prizes.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[b][color=white]FAA to Approve Boeing 737 MAX By June[/color][/b] 
The Federal Aviation Administration (FAA) and Boeing officials briefed members of the United Nations' aviation agency and International Civil Aviation Organization (ICAO) on the possible return of the 737 Max to the skies by late June.
However, the return of plane to the skies outside the US is uncertain with Europe and Canada giving their own terms. This happened as Boeing's stocks plummeted, slashing $40 billion off its market value.
No simulator training will be required, but each airline will develop its own training. If the June target is acquired, airlines will have to adjust schedules for the busy summer travel period. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-ethiopia-airplane-safety/u-s-regulator-sees-approval-of-boeing-737-max-to-fly-as-soon-as-late-june-sources-idUSKCN1ST1T1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Facebook to Launch Crypto-Currency[/color][/b] 
The coin dubbed GlobalCoin will be launched in 2020. The move is meant to create a secure and affordable way of transacting. Preparations are underway, and firms like Western Union will provide a cheaper means for sending and receiving money.
Sadly, concerns have been raised following Facebook's recent accusations on users' privacy and data. The firm is being asked what consumer protection measures the coin will employ. 
After the collapse of Facebook Credits, the company is making a comeback in the digital currencies market. They could use blockchain technology to process transactions faster or create their own payment system such as PayPal for people to transact traditional currencies which are more stable. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.bbc.com/news/business-48383460]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Google Suspends Business With Huawei    [/color][/b] 
Google has suspended some business with Huawei that will affect updates of Google services. However, existing devices will continue to function. This follows a US government blacklist.
The business will be affected outside of China, and Huawei will only have access to the open-source version of Android that has no proprietary apps and services. Also, chipmakers such as Qualcomm and Intel have been instructed not to supply software to Huawei.
Consequently, several countries have banned Huawei 5G networks. Also, Apple Inc is worried about a Chinese response that may see export fees for iPhones go up. Nonetheless, Huawei has been developing its own operating system in anticipation of an Android ban. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2019/05/google-suspends-business-huawei-blacklist-190520035555266.html]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[b][color=white]Call Of Duty Mobile Beta Is Coming Soon[/color][/b] 
More details on the Call of Duty mobile game have been released as the regional beta testing phase approaches. The starting close beta is releasing in India this coming week, and regional tests are coming to Australia and other countries in the following months. Like all other Call of Duty games beforehand, this game comes with scorestreaks, create a class and many other features. Time will only tell how this game actually is. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/call-of-duty-mobile-beta-beginning-in-some-regions/1100-6467038/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Steam Chat Mobile App Has Been Released[/color][/b] 
The Steam Mobile Chat App has been released on the Apple and Google Play store. The app is available free with plenty of features including a featured friends list, rich chat with videos, tweets, GIFs, and emoticons. With promised features in the future. This comes as a relief for many as the old steam app has been abandoned for two years. Many are placing hope on this app reviving Valves interest into the mobile market, hoping for a new update to the old steam app.  [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/valve-launches-mobile-steam-chat-app/1100-6467099/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Call Of Duty Mobile Is Going To have A Battle Royale[/color][/b] 
Two versions of Call Of Duty are being planned for this year. The rumored Modern Warfare 4, and the confirmed Call Of Duty Mobile. In a recent blog post made by Activision, they said their new Call of Duty mobile game would feature a Battle Royale similar to Black Ops 4's "Blackout." Call of Duty Mobile is still in early development, so all things about this can change. Only time will tell whether this will be a revolution for Mobile gaming. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.gamespot.com/articles/call-of-duty-mobiles-battle-royale-mode-revealed/1100-6467136/]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color][/size][/font]
